field.name: map_units
field.label: Units
field.description: Set the search units in either Miles or Kilometers

field.name: show_all_onload
field.label: Show Locations on Load
field.description: If set to Yes, locations are shown upon initial load. If set to No, then no locations will be shown on load. If set to Featured, then only featured locations would show. Total locations are still limited by Max Search Results.

field.name: marker_pref
field.label: Marker Icon Preference
field.description: Determines which icon takes preference

field.name: fix_jquery
field.label: jQuery Compatability Mode
field.description: Enable jQuery noConflict Mode. ONLY use if you are having trouble loading the store locator, and you have jQuery on your site. This MAY fix the problem. DO NOT USE UNLESS YOU ARE HAVING PROBLEMS AND USE JQUERY.

field.name: map_directions
field.label: Enable Directions
field.description: Shows an address box to type a start location for directions on each map point. When the user clicks (Go) it will launch them to google maps with directtions

field.name: map_zoom_wheel
field.label: Enable Zoom Wheel
field.description: Enable zooming via mouse wheel

field.name: map_include_terrain
field.label: Enable Terrain
field.description: Enable the Terrain map type

field.name: map_view_state
field.label: Default Map Type
field.description: Set the default map type that is shown on start

field.name: map_cluster_method
field.label: Marker Cluster Method
field.description: Set the method of clustering used on the map.

field.name: map_width
field.label: Map Width (px)
field.description: The width of the Map Area

field.name: map_height
field.label: Map Height (px)
field.description: The height of the Map Area

field.name: hide_list_onload
field.label: Hide List on Load
field.description: If set to hidden, hides the result list until a search is performed. Has no effect if the results list is set to disabled.

field.name: map_auto_zoom
field.label: Initial Zoom State
field.description: If set to Auto, and the Locations are shown on load, the map will zoom to show all current locations. Otherwise it will use the settings below.

field.name: map_default_zoom_level
field.label: Initial Zoom Level
field.description: The default zoom level of the Map Area

field.name: map_center_lat
field.label: Initial Center Latitude
field.description: The Default Center Latitude of the Map Area

field.name: map_center_lon
field.label: Initial Center Longitude
field.description: The Default Center Longitude of the Map Area

field.name: search_enabled
field.label: Enable Search
field.description: Enable / Disable the search functionality.

field.name: catsearch_enabled
field.label: Enable Category Search
field.description: Enable / Disable showing the category search filter dropdown option.

field.name: featsearch_enabled
field.label: Enable Featured Search
field.description: Enable / Disable showing the featured item search filter dropdown option.

field.name: radiussearch_enabled
field.label: Enable Radius Search
field.description: Enable / Disable showing the radius search filter dropdown option. If hidden the default search radius will be used.

field.name: list_enabled
field.label: Enable Results List
field.description: Enable / Disable showing the locations in a list next to the map.

field.name: google_suggest
field.label: Google Suggest
field.description: If the search term yields more then one possible location, offer suggestions to clarify the results.

field.name: radius_list
field.label: Radius Allowed Options
field.description: A list of allowed values to be shown on the search radius dropdown. The list is independent of the units. The list must be Comma-Delimited.

field.name: default_radius
field.label: Default Radius
field.description: Set the default Radius for the search dropdown. The value must be in the allowed values list above.

field.name: max_search_results
field.label: Max Search Results
field.description: The maximum number of locations returned in search results. Must be greater than zero.

field.name: map_max_search_zoom
field.label: Max Search Zoom Level
field.description: The maximum zoom level when returning search results. This will prevent the map from zooming in too far when there are few search results.

field.name: base_country
field.label: Country Search Bias
field.description: Sets the geocoder to bias search results as if they were sent from the country specified.
field.option: CONGO, THE DEMOCRATIC REPUBLIC OF THE
SOUTH GEORGIA AND THE SOUTH SANDWICH ISLANDS
MACEDONIA, THE FORMER YUGOSLAV REPU8LIC OF

field.name: searchlog_enabled
field.label: Search Logging
field.description: Enable logging of search queries.

field.name: search_limit
field.label: Search Limit
field.description: Enable limiting of searches per IP address. Requires Search Logging to be Enabled. Set to Zero to disable Limiting

field.name: search_limit_period
field.label: Limiting Period
field.description: The length of time before a users search limit is reset.

field.name: cust1_label
field.label: Custom Field Label 1
field.description: The Label for the Custom Field

field.name: cust2_label
field.label: Custom Field Label 2
field.description: The Label for the Custom Field

field.name: cust3_label
field.label: Custom Field Label 3
field.description: The Label for the Custom Field

field.name: cust4_label
field.label: Custom Field Label 4
field.description: The Label for the Custom Field

field.name: cust5_label
field.label: Custom Field Label 5
field.description: The Label for the Custom Field

field.name: keep_data
field.label: Safe Uninstall
field.description: Setting this to yes will preserve your database tables on uninstall

field.name: show_copyright
field.label: Show Sysgen Media Link
field.description: If set to Yes, a small tagline will appear beneth the component with our copyright and link to our website. We appreciate the support.

field.name: auto_detect_line_endings
field.label: Auto Detect Line Endings
field.description: Improves Compatability with CSV importing. Try to disable if you are having problems importing.

field.name: include_mootools
field.label: Include MooTools
field.description: Include MooTools Library from Joomla. Disable if you have conflicts.

field.name: include_css
field.label: Include CSS
field.description: Include Default Stylesheet

field.name: google_maps_v3_api_key
field.label: Google Maps Premiere API Key
field.description: Only needed for high volume sites. For-profit web sites are permitted to generate up to 25,000 map loads per day using the Google Maps JavaScript API v3. For more information, please see: http://code.google.com/apis/maps/documentation/javascript/usage.html

param.name: fix_jquery
param.label: jQuery Compatability Mode
param.description: Enable jQuery noConflict Mode. ONLY use if you are having trouble loading the store locator, and you have jQuery on your site. This MAY fix the problem. DO NOT USE UNLESS YOU ARE HAVING PROBLEMS AND USE JQUERY.
